caption.p: Relaxant effect of the Dysphania ambrosioides essential oil (EODa) on contractions maintained by potassium in isolated swine coronary arteries. Representative graph of the relaxant effect of the EODa in contractions maintained by KCl (60 mM) in isolated swine coronary arteries. Values are expressed as the mean Â± S.E.M.; n represents the number of experiments ( p < 0.001, one-way ANOVA followed by Holm-Sidak).
